images.copyright: Mount Fuji in Japan (© The Asahi Shimbun/Getty Images)
images.title: The snows of Fuji
images.caption: The snows of Fuji
images.desc: This shot of Mount Fuji's symmetrical cone was taken in September 2020, showcasing the first snow of the season. The dusting proved short-lived, melting off in just a couple of days. And snow wouldn't come again until the end of December—raising new concerns about decades of rising temperatures on Fuji's slopes.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
